entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are expected to affect the road above 700 metres Tuesday afternoon and evening. 2 to 4 cm may accumulate about and south of the summit, with lesser amounts further north.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Rain is expected to turn to snow around midnight Monday. 2 to 4 cm of snow may accumulate about the summit early Tuesday morning and lesser amounts down to 600 metres. Snow showers may continue to affect eastern parts of the road down to 300 metres through Tuesday morning and afternoon and 1 to 2 cm may accumulate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to affect the road from Monday evening through Tuesday morning. 5 to 10 cm of snow could accumulate down to 600 metres, with lesser amounts to lower levels. Snow showers may continue into Tuesday evening but accumulations for the road are not expected to be significant.
